QuestData.Title: A Threat Rises
QuestData.Description:
It is time I told you another tale. While you listen, would you be so kind as to pour me some grog? I've grown a terrible thirst.
The keg is very old and the tap is a bit slow.
QuestData.CompletionText: I've told you my tale, but did you bring the grog?
QuestData.RewardText: Delicious, thank you.$B$BBefore we act, we must gather more information onto what Helya is planning.
